EmailTemplate.description: 777 Follow-up response where date is adjusted
EmailTemplate.name: Order Expedite Request Follow-up Date Adjusted
EmailTemplate.subject: Order Expedite Request {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
We have evaluated your request for an expedited shipment and can ship your product ahead of schedule.
Your PO#: <Enter customer PO Number>
Honeywell Sales Order #: <Enter sales order number>
Part number and Date adjustments: <Add part number(s)/dates planning agreed to for a new date>
This information is already reflected in www.MyAerospace.com.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
